sentence: Clements filing contends conservative state Sen. Doug Mastriano is disqualified from seeking public office because of his efforts to overthrow the election of President Joe Biden.
title: Dr. Mehmet Oz (R. NJ), "We cannot move on from the 2020 election"

sentence: This isnt the only race with a high profile GOP candidate though could do more harm than good to the GOPs chances in November: Democrat Josh Shapiro wants Doug Mastriano to win the Pennsylvania Republican primary for governor on May 17.
title: LOL! Watch Members Of The MAGA Crowd Boo Dr. Oz (R. NJ) At Trump Rally

sentence: Gottheimer isnt the only Democrat who appears to be throwing up primary smokescreens trying to tie Republicans to Trump the Pennsylvania gubernatorial race is seeing television ads from the presumptive Democrat nominee, state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, targeting GOP state Sen. Doug Mastriano as "one of Donald Trumps strongest supporters."
title: Moderate Dem accused of trying to 'confuse' GOP primary voters with mailers tying candidate to Trump
